subtitle: Make sure you buy mussels that are very fresh and discard any that do not open during cooking.

method.text: Heat the oil in a large frying pan and saute onions and garlic for 5-10 min or until softened. Stir in courgettes, peppers and mushrooms. Cover and simmer for 10-15 min.
Gently mix in the tomatoes and seasoning. Reduce heat and cook for 5 min.

Place mussels in a large pan with the wine. Heat briskly until steaming. Cover, reduce heat slightly and cook for 2-3 min. Remove the open mussels and keep aside. Continue cooking, removing the mussels as they open and discard any mussels which remain closed.
Strain the mussel cooking liquor through muslin. Return to a clean pan and boil until it reduces down to half the volume.
Add the cooked mussels, the reduced cooking liquor and parsley into the vegetable sauce and heat through gently. Serve immediately.

title: Mussels in a tomato sauce
